author: CT Phipps
description:
Mind’s Horizon by Eric Malikyte is something of a combination of The Last of Us, Event Horizon, Fallout, and maybe The Walking Dead. If that sounds like a lot of things being combined, it’s not really and is a simple story: a bunch of survivors of a winter apocalypse find a seemingly abandoned government bunker […]

The post REVIEW: Mind’s Horizon by Eric Malikyte appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: REVIEW: Mind’s Horizon by Eric Malikyte
